tr_welcomeDesc: Thanks for registering! We’re excited for you to explore Organized. Watch this introductory video to start using the app and make organizing all your theocratic activities easier:
tr_moreInfoGuideLabel: User guide that provides step-by-step instructions
tr_moreInfoBlogLabel: Our blog with tips and useful features
tr_moreInfoSupportLabel: Support the app with a donation to power its growth
tr_login: Log in to your Organized account
tr_loginDesc: We've received a request to log in with your email. Please confirm the login by clicking the button below.
tr_loginAltText: If you can’t use the login button above, please use the following link. Make sure it is not cropped when you are copying it:
tr_loginIgnoreText: If you did not request this link, please just ignore this email.
